module.title: chrononyms
module.p: Chrononyms are names identifying events and historical eras.

Chrononyms always seem to be name-descriptions rather than proper nouns, e.g. An Cogadh Mòr The Great War, Bliadhna Theàrlaich 1745-6, Linn an Umha The Bronze Age, An Seachdamh Linn Deug The 17th Century, Na Seachdadan The (19)70s.
Note that (post-specified) chrononyms are not lenited in the genitive eg. deireadh Cogadh a’ Chamais the end of the Gulf War, not deireadh Chogadh a’ Chamais.

box.title: Non-lenition of chrononyms as genitive specifiers

li.gd: Bha e mion-eòlach air eachdraidh Bliadhna a’ Phrionnsa [...]
